nl.weeaboo.vn.video

Interface IVideo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderEnvConsumer, IStreamingMedia, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IVideo
extends java.io.Serializable, IStreamingMedia, IRenderEnvConsumer

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        void prepare()
      throws java.io.IOException
        Preloads some data structures so start() needs to do less work. Calling this method entirely optional.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • isPrepared

        boolean isPrepared()
        Returns:
        true if a call to prepare() has any use, or false if prepare-ing further has no use.

      • start

        void start()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Starts video playback.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while trying to open the video file for streaming.

      • render

        void render()
        Renders the current video frame to the screen.

      • getFilename

        nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath getFilename()
        Returns:
        The path of the video source file.

      • getPrivateVolume

        double getPrivateVolume()
        Returns the private volume.
        See Also:
        setPrivateVolume(double)

      • getMasterVolume

        double getMasterVolume()
        Returns the master volume.
        See Also:
        setMasterVolume(double)

      • getVolume

        double getVolume()
        Returns the final volume used for audio playback. The final volume is determined by multiplying the private and master volume values together.

      • setPrivateVolume

        void setPrivateVolume(double v)
        Set the private volume. This is the volume setting intended for use by scripts.
        See Also:
        getVolume()

      • setMasterVolume

        void setMasterVolume(double v)
        Sets the master volume. This is the volume setting controlled by user preferences.
        See Also:
        getVolume()
